name: Adlerber
content: Adlerber was a skittish Arcona dealer who worked with the Kubaz Monigallgh. The two were invited by Zeva Bliss of the Spice Runners of Kijimi to a summit on Kijimi, where Bliss secretly intended to kill the criminals present. Bliss was stopped by former Spice Runner Poe Dameron, and Adlerber and the other criminals were allowed to escape.
